answers.answer: Good deal, I was wondering if you were going to udate us after your appt. today. I am sitting here looking at extreme couponing, so now I have started trying to find some diapers coupons on the internet
I am so excited for you!

Ladies, thank you!We were thiiiis close to going into the hospital last night because I was having heavy and steady contractions again.  They were lasting about 1 - 1 1/2 minutes each and coming about 2 minutes apart.  I labored like this at home for about an hour.  Just as my husband called his mom to see if she could come and watch our two year old (who was adopted- this is our first pregnancy) while he slept, the contractions let up and became mild.  So we all went to sleep.I woke up at 5:00 this morning with some blood-tinged mucus.  Is this the "bloody show?"  Or losing my mucus plug?  I have pretty bad cramping, but I heard cramping is normal???  I haven't had really strong or regular contractions this morning.  Just small infrequent ones.  If they get intense and regular again, I think we'll head to the hospital.  I just hate to go in and have them tell me it's all pre-term still!  I just don't know since this is our first pregnancy!  Even though I feel so educated, I still feel clueless when it comes to the "Am i actually in labor?" question!!

I know the feeling, I went 3 times to the ER& L&D, the second time I went the had given me sooo much medication I was feeling worse thsn when I came in. Only thing is I am schedule for a csection and I dont want o go in labor and dilate. Thats the thing to you cannot tell if you are dilated or not, well, I cant tell anyway. I know being on bedrest you think of so many things you need to get get before you have the baby, not just for the babay but for yourself and family.I dont know if I am ready to have this babay because we dont know what it is, or I want my body back so I can sleep and walk correctly...lol. But I Thank God I did not have to go on bedfrest in the hospital, at least not as of today anyway.But you are right there, days away. I know you are too excited. I would not be able to sleep. How are you feeling today. Dont tell me you are at the hospital!!!!!!
Where are you lady, Are you having that baby. Maybe I am on here too much since I have ben on bedrest. So I thonk people suppose to repsond like asap..lol

question: Weeks: 36+1Dilation: 1 cmEffacement: 90%Station/Engagement: Baby is low and engagedThis is my first pregnancy.  I've had preeclampsia.  My doctor has been planning on inducing me once I reach 37 weeks.  My induction is scheduled for the 19th.  But when I heard how effaced I am, I'm thinking that maybe my body can do this on its own!  It's the most amazing feeling!!
title: Dilation and Effacement Measurements
